name: 吳忠敏
objective:
觀摩現今的全球化趨勢，並帶領學生學習企業家的國際觀與創業思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對於全球化發展的認知與瞭解。
To learn from a tendency of today's globalization and study from an entrepreneur's innovation and creation thinking, furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.
